title: Death Stranding Review Round-Up - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.01.19
description:
Right now, go to http://escapetheinvasion.com/kfgames for 20% off your first box.

Quip starts at just $25 and you’ll get your first refill FREE at http://getquip.com/games.

Tim and Greg talk about the divisive Death Stranding reviews and answer your Kojima questions.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:30 - Housekeeping
Halloween Hellscape is up: youtube.com/kindafunnygames
Extra Life is TOMORROW! 24 hours of games for charity! Join us now at kindafunny.com/extralife or watch on the day!
The Roper Report   -
00:04:22 - Death Stranding Review Round-Up
00:12:56 - “There seems to be a celebration on the negative side that the game is exactly what people thought it was…” - Borzen00
00:18:10 - “Is being divisive in this way OK, and a fantastic sign that this is a new example of what the games industry can offer?” - The Nano Biologist
00:28:22 - “How important was Norman reedus peeing in Death Stranding?” - Anthony
00:28:41 - “How’s that trophy list, Greg?” - Drew
00:29:35 - “Do you think I could avoid spoilers until it comes out next year?” - Joshua
00:30:49 - “Do you think we are living in the best time for storytelling in video games?” - BJ Bernardo
00:36:57 - Amazon blocking unauthorized Nintendo Producers
00:38:33 - Anthem Lead Leaves BioWare
00:41:11 - ZeniMax Offering Australian Fallout 76 Refunds
00:43:16 - Out today
00:46:45 -  Escape the Invasion
00:48:18 - Quip
Reader mail   -
00:49:28 - “Have you ever enjoyed a multiplayer game, but had to stop playing it because of poor match matching or a lack of players?” - EJ
00:52:01 - Squad Up: Tony - JerichoTVB on all platforms
00:54:04 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
MONDAY: Greg and Tim
TUESDAY: Greg and Imran
WEDNESDAY: Greg and Fran
THURSDAY: Greg and Imran
FRIDAY: Greg and Tim
